verses.verse: מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְאֵיתָ֥ן <S%H387><s%> of Ethan הָֽאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <S%H250><s%> the Ezrahite חַֽסְדֵ֣י <S%H2617><s%> of the mercies יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever אָשִׁ֑ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> to all וָדֹ֓ר ׀ <S%H1755><s%> generations אוֹדִ֖יעַ <S%H3045><s%> will I make known אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <S%H530><s%> thy faithfulness בְּפִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> with my mouth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> For I have said ע֭וֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> for ever חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Mercy יִבָּנֶ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> shall be built up שָׁמַ֓יִם ׀ <S%H8064><s%> in the very heavens תָּכִ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> shalt thou establish אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <S%H530><s%> thy faithfulness בָהֶֽם׃

כָּרַ֣תִּֽי <S%H3772><s%> I have made בְ֭רִית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לִבְחִירִ֑י <S%H972><s%> with my chosen נִ֝שְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> I have sworn לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David עַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H5650><s%> my servant

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for ע֭וֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> ever אָכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> will I establish זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> Thy seed וּבָנִ֨יתִי <S%H1129><s%> and build up לְדֹר־ <S%H1755><s%> to all וָד֖וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generations כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <S%H3678><s%> thy throne סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

וְי֘וֹד֤וּ <S%H3034><s%> shall praise שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> And the heavens פִּלְאֲךָ֣ <S%H6382><s%> thy wonders יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> thy faithfulness בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> also in the congregation קְדֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6918><s%> of the saints

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who בַ֭שַּׁחַק <S%H7834><s%> For who in the heaven יַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <S%H6186><s%> can be compared לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יִדְמֶ֥ה <S%H1819><s%> can be likened לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אֵלִים׃ <S%H410><s%> of the mighty

אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God נַ֭עֲרָץ <S%H6206><s%> to be feared בְּסוֹד־ <S%H5475><s%> in the assembly קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> of the saints רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> is greatly וְ֝נוֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> and to be had in reverence עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סְבִיבָֽיו׃ <S%H5439><s%> of all [them that are] about

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> who כָֽמ֖וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> is like חֲסִ֥ין ׀ <S%H2626><s%> who [is] a strong יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> LORD וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness סְבִיבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You מ֭וֹשֵׁל <S%H4910><s%> Thou rulest בְּגֵא֣וּת <S%H1348><s%> the raging הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea בְּשׂ֥וֹא <S%H7721><s%> thereof arise גַ֝לָּ֗יו <S%H1530><s%> when the waves אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You תְשַׁבְּחֵֽם׃ <S%H7623><s%> thou stillest

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> Yourself דִכִּ֣אתָ <S%H1792><s%> in pieces כֶחָלָ֣ל <S%H2491><s%> as one that is slain רָ֑הַב <S%H7294><s%> Rahab בִּזְר֥וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> with thy strong פִּזַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H6340><s%> thou hast scattered אוֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H341><s%> thine enemies

לְךָ֣ שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> The heavens אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also לְךָ֥ אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [are] thine the earth תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> also [is] thine [as for] the world וּ֝מְלֹאָ֗הּ <S%H4393><s%> and the fulness אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You יְסַדְתָּֽם׃ <S%H3245><s%> thereof thou hast founded

צָפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> The north וְ֭יָמִין <S%H3225><s%> and the south אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You בְרָאתָ֑ם <S%H1254><s%> thou hast created תָּב֥וֹר <S%H8396><s%> them Tabor וְ֝חֶרְמ֗וֹן <S%H2768><s%> and Hermon בְּשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> in thy name יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> shall rejoice

לְךָ֣ זְ֭רוֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> have a גְּבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> Thou hast a mighty תָּעֹ֥ז <S%H5810><s%> strong יָ֝דְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> is thy hand תָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> [and] high יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> is thy right hand

צֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Justice וּ֭מִשְׁפָּט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <S%H4349><s%> [are] the habitation כִּסְאֶ֑ךָ <S%H3678><s%> of thy throne חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> and truth יְֽקַדְּמ֥וּ <S%H6923><s%> shall go פָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> before thy face

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Blessed הָ֭עָם <S%H5971><s%> [is] the people יוֹדְעֵ֣י <S%H3045><s%> that know תְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> the joyful sound יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD בְּֽאוֹר־ <S%H216><s%> in the light פָּנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> of thy countenance יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <S%H1980><s%> they shall walk

בְּ֭שִׁמְךָ <S%H8034><s%> In thy name יְגִיל֣וּן <S%H1523><s%> shall they rejoice כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day וּבְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> and in thy righteousness יָרֽוּמוּ׃ <S%H7311><s%> shall they be exalted

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תִפְאֶ֣רֶת <S%H8597><s%> For thou [art] the glory עֻזָּ֣מוֹ <S%H5797><s%> of their strength אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> and by וּ֝בִרְצֹנְךָ֗ <S%H7522><s%> and in thy favour [תָּרִים כ] (תָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> bring up ק) קַרְנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H7161><s%> our horn

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD מָֽגִנֵּ֑נוּ <S%H4043><s%> [is] our defence וְלִקְד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> and the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מַלְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H4428><s%> [is] our king

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Once דִּבַּ֥רְתָּֽ־ <S%H1696><s%> Then thou spakest בְחָ֡זוֹן <S%H2377><s%> in vision לַֽחֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <S%H2623><s%> to thy holy one וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and saidst שִׁוִּ֣יתִי <S%H7737><s%> I have laid עֵ֭זֶר <S%H5828><s%> help עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto גִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> upon [one that is] mighty הֲרִימ֖וֹתִי <S%H7311><s%> I have exalted בָח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> young מֵעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> out of the people

מָ֭צָאתִי <S%H4672><s%> I have found דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David עַבְדִּ֑י <S%H5650><s%> my servant בְּשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil קָדְשִׁ֣י <S%H6944><s%> with my holy מְשַׁחְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H4886><s%> have I anointed

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָ֭דִי <S%H3027><s%> With whom my hand תִּכּ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> shall be established עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also זְרוֹעִ֥י <S%H2220><s%> mine arm תְאַמְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H553><s%> also shall strengthen

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַשִּׁ֣א <S%H5378><s%> shall not exact אוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> The enemy בּ֑וֹ וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> upon him nor the son עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <S%H5766><s%> of wickedness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְעַנֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6031><s%> afflict
וְכַתּוֹתִ֣י <S%H3807><s%> And I will beat down מִפָּנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before his face צָרָ֑יו <S%H6862><s%> his foes וּמְשַׂנְאָ֥יו <S%H8130><s%> them that hate אֶגּֽוֹף׃ <S%H5062><s%> and plague

וֶֽאֶֽמוּנָתִ֣י <S%H530><s%> But my faithfulness וְחַסְדִּ֣י <S%H2617><s%> and my mercy עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> and in וּ֝בִשְׁמִ֗י <S%H8034><s%> [shall be] with him and in my name תָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> be exalted קַרְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7161><s%> shall his horn
וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> I will set בַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> also in the sea יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וּֽבַנְּהָר֥וֹת <S%H5104><s%> in the rivers יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> and his right hand

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יִ֭קְרָאֵנִי <S%H7121><s%> He shall cry אָ֣בִי <S%H1><s%> unto me Thou [art] my father אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you אֵ֝לִ֗י <S%H410><s%> my God וְצ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> and the rock יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <S%H3444><s%> of my salvation

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also אָ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> him [my] firstborn אֶתְּנֵ֑הוּ <S%H5414><s%> Also I will make עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> higher לְמַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> than the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

לְ֭עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> for him for evermore [אֶשְׁמֹור־ כ] (אֶשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> will keep ל֣וֹ <S%H8104><s%> will I keep ק) חַסְדִּ֑י <S%H2617><s%> My mercy וּ֝בְרִיתִ֗י <S%H1285><s%> and my covenant נֶאֱמֶ֥נֶת <S%H539><s%> shall stand fast לֽוֹ׃

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> also will I make לָעַ֣ד <S%H5703><s%> [to endure] for ever זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> His seed וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ <S%H3678><s%> and his throne כִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> as the days שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יַֽעַזְב֣וּ <S%H5800><s%> forsake בָ֭נָיו <S%H1121><s%> If his children תּוֹרָתִ֑י <S%H8451><s%> my law וּ֝בְמִשְׁפָּטַ֗י <S%H4941><s%> not in my judgments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵלֵכֽוּן׃ <S%H1980><s%> walk

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If חֻקֹּתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> my statutes יְחַלֵּ֑לוּ <S%H2490><s%> If they break וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <S%H4687><s%> not my commandments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H8104><s%> and keep

וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <S%H6485><s%> Then will I visit בְשֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> with the rod פִּשְׁעָ֑ם <S%H6588><s%> their transgression וּבִנְגָעִ֥ים <S%H5061><s%> with stripes עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> and their iniquity

וְ֭חַסְדִּי <S%H2617><s%> Nevertheless my lovingkindness לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor אָפִ֣יר <S%H6331><s%> will I not utterly take מֵֽעִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֲ֝שַׁקֵּ֗ר <S%H8266><s%> to fail בֶּאֱמוּנָתִֽי׃ <S%H530><s%> from him nor suffer my faithfulness

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֲחַלֵּ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> will I not break בְּרִיתִ֑י <S%H1285><s%> My covenant וּמוֹצָ֥א <S%H4161><s%> the thing that is gone out שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י <S%H8193><s%> of my lips לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֲשַׁנֶּֽה׃ <S%H8138><s%> nor alter

אַ֭חַת <S%H259><s%> Once נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> have I sworn בְקָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> by my holiness אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אֲכַזֵּֽב׃ <S%H3576><s%> that I will not lie

זַ֭רְעוֹ <S%H2233><s%> His seed לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> shall endure for ever יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> shall endure וְכִסְא֖וֹ <S%H3678><s%> and his throne כַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> as the sun נֶגְדִּֽי׃ <S%H5048><s%> before

כְּ֭יָרֵחַ <S%H3394><s%> as the moon יִכּ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> It shall be established עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְעֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> witness בַּ֝שַּׁ֗חַק <S%H7834><s%> in heaven נֶאֱמָ֥ן <S%H539><s%> and [as] a faithful סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You זָ֭נַחְתָּ <S%H2186><s%> But thou hast cast off וַתִּמְאָ֑ס <S%H3988><s%> and abhorred הִ֝תְעַבַּ֗רְתָּ <S%H5674><s%> thou hast been wroth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4899><s%> with thine anointed

נֵ֭אַרְתָּה <S%H5010><s%> Thou hast made void בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <S%H2490><s%> thou hast profaned לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [by casting it] to the ground נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5145><s%> his crown

פָּרַ֥צְתָּ <S%H6555><s%> Thou hast broken down כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּדֵרֹתָ֑יו <S%H1448><s%> all his hedges שַׂ֖מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> thou hast brought מִבְצָרָ֣יו <S%H4013><s%> his strong holds מְחִתָּה׃ <S%H4288><s%> to ruin

שַׁ֭סֻּהוּ <S%H8155><s%> spoil כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֹ֣בְרֵי <S%H5674><s%> All that pass by דָ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has חֶ֝רְפָּ֗ה <S%H2781><s%> him he is a reproach לִשְׁכֵנָֽיו׃ <S%H7934><s%> to his neighbours
